title: La Huerta de Martino
typeOfFood: Pizza, Italian, Organic, Beer/Wine, Latin American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This restaurant uses organic produce and bakes its own bread. Menu includes veggie choices: calzone, tacos, roasted vegetables. Willing to make most menu items vegan when requested.
streetAddress: Av 25 de Mayo y Rondeau Piriapolis
